plugin.name: Repaint_Buffer
plugin.author: Fiendish
plugin.purpose: Condenses repaint calls from other plugins to reduce display overhead

muclient.script:
repaint_on_tick = false last_repaint_time = utils.timer() paused = false
function pause() paused = true end
function resume() paused = false end
function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if ((msg == 999) and (text == "repaint")) then repaint_on_tick = true if (paused == false) and (utils.timer() - last_repaint_time > .1) then repaint_on_tick = false Repaint() last_repaint_time = utils.timer() end elseif ((msg == 999) and (text == "pause_repaint")) then paused = true elseif ((msg == 999) and (text == "resume_repaint")) then paused = false end end
-- if ticks are coming through, then we have enough time to repaint again function OnPluginTick() if (repaint_on_tick == true) and (paused == false) then repaint_on_tick = false Repaint() last_repaint_time = utils.timer() end end
function OnPluginDisable() EnablePlugin(GetPluginID(), true) ColourNote("white", "blue", "You are not allowed to disable the ".. GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 1).." plugin. It is necessary for other plugins.") end
function getmemoryusage() collectgarbage('collect') return collectgarbage('count') end
